definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: The hydroxycitronellal has been synthesized from citronella oil .
sentences.chinese: 從香茅油出發合成了羥基香茅醛。

sentences.english: The hydroxycitronellal has been synthesized from citronella oil .
sentences.chinese: 從香茅油出發合成了羥基香茅醛。

sentences.english: Crush the lemongrass and galanga. Cut into sections.
sentences.chinese: 拍松香茅以及南姜，切段。

sentences.english: I also like that it has the citronella to protect from bug bites.
sentences.chinese: 我也非常喜歡它含有香茅成分來防止蚊蟲叮咬。

sentences.english: Plant some citronella trees to keep away the mosquitos.
sentences.chinese: 那可以種香茅，還能順便驅蚊。

sentences.english: Finely slice the lemongrass, galangal, garlic, shallot, ginger and chili.
sentences.chinese: 把香茅，良姜，蒜，幹蔥，姜和辣椒切成細絲或碎。

sentences.english: Consists of citronella its . it s safe effective.
sentences.chinese: 也是採用香茅油的精華製成，安全有效。

sentences.english: Add the bruised lemongrass and curry leaves, and fry until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 加入拍扁的香茅和咖喱葉，炒香。

sentences.english: By rationally simplifying a mathematical model of batch rectification collum on citronella oil is presented.
sentences.chinese: 通過合理簡化，提出了香茅油間歇精餾塔的數學模型。

sentences.english: Lemongrass, orange and geranium, a perfect combination to relax your body.
sentences.chinese: 香茅，鮮橙和天竺葵的完美融合，放鬆身心。

sentences.english: After about 8 months, the citronella loses its punch.
sentences.chinese: 大約八個月之後，香茅失去了功效。

sentences.english: Light citronella candles to keep mosquitoes at bay.

definition: tamarind (Tamarindus indica) tropical tree with bean-like fruit/pickled caper
